org.apereo.cas.services

Class CouchbaseServiceRegistryDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apereo.cas.services.CouchbaseServiceRegistryDao
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServiceRegistryDao

    @RefreshScope
 @Component(value="couchbaseServiceRegistryDao")
public class CouchbaseServiceRegistryDao
extends java.lang.Object
implements ServiceRegistryDao
    This is CouchbaseServiceRegistryDao. A Service Registry storage backend which uses the memcached protocol. This may seem like a weird idea until you realize that CouchBase is a multi host NoSQL database with a memcached interface to persistent storage which also is quite usable as a replicated ticket storage engine for multiple front end CAS servers.
    Since:
    4.2.0

        Description copied from interface: ServiceRegistryDao
